name: Das Nibelungenlied - A Visual Novel
description:
Welcome to our first ever visual novel: "Das Nibelungenlied"!

The Song of the Nibelungs is a german epic poem of the middle ages; telling stories about dragons, heroes, love and revenge, and now you can enter this world yourself! 

We hope that whoever plays this small but informative novel enjoys it, because thousands of coffee beans had to die in the process of creating it. 

Now have fun!
